comment.author: 39303677@N00
comment._content: This photo is a little time capsule.

comment.author: 47908901@N03
comment._content: The few photos we put up are actually part of a larger collection of showing the retail areas in Hartlepool such as Lynn Street, Musgrave Street, Burbank taken by a photographer called John Boagey in the 1960s. They're a fantastic collection to show how that particular part of Hartlepool looked prior to the demolition or change of many of these streets. Interesting to see how many shopping streets there were prior Middleton Grange Shopping Centre.

comment.author: 66961359@N03
comment._content: These streets would have provided a far more intersting alternative shopping experience today if they had been saved. One could imagine thriving street cafes, craft shops, boutiques,specialist hobby shops etc.

comment.author: 52205839@N06
comment._content: The car is a Vauxhall PA SX Cresta or Velox from 1960 or 61
